page.title: 06HOME LIFE
page.content: I then go to the canteen to eat lunch-today we had sausages and potatoes, followed by jam scones and a drink of black currant juice.We then play in the playground untill 1.30 p.m.Today we went to the Playing Fields for Atheletics or Rounders practice.School finishes at 3:15 p.m Today mum came to school to pick us up and take us home.After we leave for school Mum tidys and cleans the house and hangs out the washing to dry in the garden.At 10:00 a.m she drives the 7 miles to bridgwater to work in an office.She works untill 2:30.On the way back ,she goes to the shops.After school my friend Ben comes over to play.We play computer games and then go out side to play cricket.
